rows.label: Plan Price (per month)
rows.description: The monthly or yearly cost of your Crisp subscription plan.

rows.label: Agents included
rows.description: Number of agent licences included in your plan at no extra cost.

rows.label: Additional agents (per month)
rows.description: Add more seats to your plan and scale your team as needed.

rows.label: Customer Profiles
rows.description: Maximum number of unique customer profiles you can manage in your workspace.

rows.label: AI Usage
rows.description: Number of AI-powered actions (like summaries or replies) available per day.

rows.label: Cloud-based
rows.description: Your Crisp data and conversations are securely hosted in the cloud, always accessible and backed up.

rows.label: Mobile Apps
rows.description: Get everything related to your customer service right in your pocket.

rows.label: Desktop Apps
rows.description: Use Crisp on Windows and Mac for a seamless desktop experience.

rows.label: Real-time notifications
rows.description: Receive alerts to stay up to date with your opened conversations.

rows.label: Developer APIs
rows.description: Access Crisp APIs to build custom integrations and automate workflows.

rows.label: Live Geolocation map
rows.description: See all your active website visitors in real time and start conversations.

rows.description: Easily export or view the full transcript of customer conversations.

rows.description: Automatically sort and organize incoming conversations for efficient handling.

rows.label: Working hours settings
rows.description: Define your business hours to set expectations and automate responses outside those times.

rows.label: Unlimited conversations
rows.description: Handle as many customer conversations as you need, with no limits.

rows.label: Custom email domain
rows.description: Setup a custom domain to send your outbound emails and improve deliverability.

rows.label: Full conversations' history
rows.description: Access the full history of your customer conversations for context and insights.

rows.label: Internal notes
rows.description: Make internal collaboration easy, centralized and personalized for each conversation.

rows.label: Visitor Banning
rows.description: Block users having disrespectful behavior on any channel.

rows.label: Conversation ratings
rows.description: Send automated surveys that measure customer satisfaction score.

rows.label: Follow-up reminders
rows.description: Schedule pre-defined or custom reminders on each conversation with detailed attached.

rows.description: Assign conversations automatically to available agents in a fair, rotating manner.

rows.description: Offer a dedicated portal to your customers where they can open new tickets or follow existing ones.

rows.label: Chat widget
rows.description: Engage with people that are browsing your website and get closer to your customers.
